abstract: On Sept. 15, Microsoft plans to launch its new Zune HD portable media player, which could actually take the fight to Apple’s iPod Touch.
snippet: On Sept. 15, Microsoft plans to launch its new Zune HD portable media player, which could actually take the fight to Apple’s iPod Touch.
lead_paragraph: How many times have you read this on a gadget blog:

headline.main: Yet Another Media Player Plans to Take on the Leader
headline.print_headline: Yet Another Media Player Plans to Take On the Leader

abstract: Amazon, Microsoft and Yahoo are planning to join a coalition to oppose a proposed class-action settlement giving Google the rights to commercialize digital copies of millions of books.
snippet: Amazon, Microsoft and Yahoo are planning to join a coalition to oppose a proposed class-action settlement giving Google the rights to commercialize digital copies of millions of books.
lead_paragraph: Amazon, Microsoft and Yahoo are planning to join a coalition of nonprofit groups, individuals and library associations to oppose a proposed class-action settlement giving Google the rights to commercialize digital copies of millions of books.

headline.main: Google Rivals Will Oppose Book Settlement
headline.print_headline: 3 of Google’s Rivals Oppose Settlement on Digital Books
